name: Defend The Great Machine
description:
The great machine has been invaded by bugs. It is up to Jennifer to squash the bugs using her trusty bug squashing gun.

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow keys - move
  • Mouse 1/Space - fire bouncing ball (will ricochet off walls, be careful they hurt!)
  • Mouse 2/F - fire bean bag (won't bounce off walls)
  • F3 - Debug mode - shows FPS and AI data. In debug mode F4 will spawn crawler and numeric keypad 2/4/6/8 jumps over walls.
  • F11 - Switch to full screen mode.
  • Z - adjust zoom (three levels).

Written in C# using MonoGame and the Aether.Physics2D library (because I suck at writing collision detection). All images are either my own or Creative Commons. Music by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com).

This is a homage to the 1983 DOS text-mode computer games Snipes.

Git: https://github.com/David-Lees/GreatMachine
